TextToken.Name: Warningbox
TextToken.Description:
Surrounds the content in a light yellow, bordered warning box. Example:
(warningbox:ENTER YOUR CONTENT HERE)

TextToken.Name: Alertbox
TextToken.Description:
Surrounds the content in a red, bordered alert box. Example:
(alertbox:ENTER YOUR CONTENT HERE)

TextToken.Name: Infobox
TextToken.Description:
Surrounds the content in a blue, bordered information box. Example:
(infobox:ENTER YOUR CONTENT HERE)

TextToken.Name: Successbox
TextToken.Description:
Surrounds the content in a green, bordered success box. Example:
(successbox:ENTER YOUR CONTENT HERE)

TextToken.Name: Youtube
TextToken.Description:
Adds a youtube video:
(Youtube:Enter the youtube id here)

TextToken.Name: Warningbox
TextToken.Description:
Surrounds the content in a light yellow, bordered warning box. Example:
@@warningbox:ENTER YOUR CONTENT HERE@@

TextToken.Name: Alertbox
TextToken.Description:
Surrounds the content in a red, bordered alert box. Example:
@@alertbox:ENTER YOUR CONTENT HERE@@

TextToken.Name: Infobox alternative
TextToken.Description:
Surrounds the content in a blue, bordered information box. Example:
@@infobox:ENTER YOUR CONTENT HERE@@

TextToken.Name: Successbox alternative.
TextToken.Description:
Surrounds the content in a green, bordered success box. Example:
@@successbox:ENTER YOUR CONTENT HERE@@
